Text: Dec Schedule and Position Cc Lisa here is a sample of what Jesse Bryson was doing on the monthly schedule activity basically just took the applicable Enron monthly schedule from the contract package and added it to the WAPA hydro monthly schedule I have given your Namenumber to Lynn Garrett who is our WAPA POC for this the Enron allocation per contract must be green energy certifable with green tags for use at Edwards Ill be in touch Paul Weaver Base Energy Manager Edwards AFB Original Message From Bryson Jesse mailtoJesse NRONcom Sent Wednesday November PM To Paul Weaver Email Subject Dec Schedule and Position Paul Attached is the December model which shows EAFB approx MWh short on MidPeak and MWh long on OffPeak I intend to monitor it every couple days to see how this years load compares to last year and perhaps we can make an adjustment accordingly I have also attached the Hydro schedule I sent to WAPA and SCE As Elliot mentioned we will continue to keep you posted as developments occur here at Enron Regards Jesse Dec Hydro Schedulexls Edwards December Schedulexls This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
